Package xgui

Interface Summary
xiDesktop Interface to desktop.
xiDimBrowser Interface of DIM browser.
xiDimCommand Interface to command objects.
xiDimParameter Interface to parameter objects.
xiPanelGraphics Interface for JPanels to be put in xPanelGraphics.
xiPanelItem JPanel items to be placed into xPanelGraphics.
xiParser Interface to name parser.
xiUserCommand Interface to be implemented by application panels.
xiUserInfoHandler Interface to be implemented by application panels.
xiUserPanel Interface to be implemented by application panels.
 

Class Summary
xConvert Swapping function.
xCrypt Encrypt passwords.
xDesktop Top desktop class.
xDimBrowser DIM browser.
xDimCommand DIM command class
xDimNameInfo InfoHandler to manage list of DIM servers.
xDimParameter A list of these objects is the central management of DIM parameters.
xForm Base class to keep the data of the setup forms for MBS and DABC
xFormDabc Base class to keep the data of the setup forms for DABC.
xFormMbs Base class to keep the data of the setup forms for MBS Reads/writes XML setup file.
xGui Main class.
xHisto Panel with histogram display.
xInfo Graphic item info line.
xInternalCompound Special internal frame for one to four split panes.
xInternalFrame Frame for one panel.
xLayout Layout objects keep information about the appearance of panels: Position, size, columns, and visibility.
xLogger Central print function into logger window.
xMeter Graphic item rate meter.
xPanelCommand Panel for command tree
xPanelDabc Form panel to control DABC.
xPanelDabcMbs Form panel to control DABC.
xPanelGraphics Container panel for graphic panels.
xPanelHisto Panel for set of histogram panels.
xPanelInfo Panel for set of info panels.
xPanelLogger DIM GUI class
xPanelMbs Form panel to control MBS.
xPanelMeter Panel for set of meter panels.
xPanelParameter Handles parameter table.
xPanelPrompt Base class for prompt panels.
xPanelSelect Panel for display of selected list of parameters.
xPanelSetup Panel to display context from Xdaq XML file as editable textfields.
xPanelState Container panel for State panels.
xParser Parser for (de)composing DIM service names.
xParTable Table model for parameter table.
xRate Graphic rate meter (bar).
xRecord Base class for DIM record data.
xRecordHisto Dim record data for histogram.
xRecordInfo Dim record data for info.
xRecordMeter Dim record data for meter.
xRecordState Dim record data for state.
xRemoteShell Remote shell execution.
xSaveRestore Base class for DIM SaveRestore data.
xSet Singleton and registry.
xSetup Used in DABC form panel to read/edit/write Xdaq setup files.
xState Graphic item state.
xTimer Timer class to launch actions.
xXmlParser Parser for XML formatted command descriptions.
